original_text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents, saying, Lord, thou deliveredst unto me five talents: behold, I have gained beside them five talents more.
korean_text: 다섯 달란트 받았던 자는 다섯 달란트를 더 가지고 와서 이르되 주인이여 내게 다섯 달란트를 주셨는데 보소서 내가 또 다섯 달란트를 남겼나이다

sentences.original_text: And so he that had received five talents came
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 다섯 달란트를 받았던 그가 와서

sentences.original_text: saying, Lord, thou deliveredst unto me five talents:
sentences.korean_translation: 주여, 당신은 내게 다섯 달란트를 주셨다고 말하며

sentences.original_text: behold, I have gained beside them five talents more.
sentences.korean_translation: 보십시오, 그들 외에 다섯 달란트를 더 얻었습니다.
